sections.title: Calm, Repair, Protect
sections.subtitle: Helps restore the skin barrier and ease redness after procedures or everyday stress.

sections.heading: One ingredient. Real results.
sections.body: Kapunka is a clinic-minded skincare brand built around a single, exceptional ingredient: 100% organic argan oil, cold-pressed and lab-tested. Made to calm irritation, support healing, and protect the skin barrier—without perfume, preservatives, or fillers.

sections.caption: KAPUNKA • PURE ARGAN OIL • COLD-PRESSED • SKIN • HAIR • NAILS •
